1.content:
Which one experiences the changes:

Name: Sam (Samantha)
Age: 18
Height: 5,7 ft (1,75 m)
Cup size: C
Description: Sam is a lovely, cute, open person and the provider of the household and works at the local convenience store. She is very proud of her body and especially her long slender legs and her voluptious bosom, she has blonde shoulder long hair a pretty face and blue eyes. She is of slightly below average intelligence and didn't do well in school, she fooled around with boys too much and partied too often instead of learning.

Flaws and jealousy: Even though Sam loves her sisters more than anything she hates how easy everything seems to be for her younger sister Jasmine who does not have to learn or do anything at all to be the best in school. Also she is very jealous of Jasmine's eyes and huge volouptious hips and lips.


Name: Jas (Jasmine)
Age: 16
Height: 5,2 ft (1,58 m)
Cup Size: Barely B
Description: Jas is a lazy but very smart young woman. She always finds the easiest way to achieve her goals if she sets any. Due to her high intelligence she does not have to try or work hard to be successful in school. She is quite small and petite if it was not for her huge round plump ass people would mistake her for a 10 year old. Her face is also quite pretty, with lucious plump lips and long eye lashes and big beautiful green eyes.

Flaws and jealousy: She has quite short legs and is jealous of her sister Sam's long slender legs and general height. She also hates how big Sam's breasts are and that her's won't grow no matter the supplements she tries. She is also not very fond of her younger sister Isa, who just now has overtaken her in height as she hit her latest growth spurt. She fears Isa could grow even bigger and more beautiful than Sam.


Name: Isa (Isabelle)
Age: 12
Height: 5,3 ft (1,61 m)
Cup Size: AA
Description: The youngest of the three, she is a very petite tomboyish looking girl with very very long blonde hair, and a blue and green eye, but practically no curves to speak of as of now, yet she enjoys annoying her sisters about how she will be the prettiest of them, especially Jas since she is now taller than her, she teases Jas and Sam about how she will overtake them in height and breast size in no time.

Flaws and jealousy: She hopes that she will be the prettiest, bustiest and overall biggest woman of the three. It can't happen soon enough, but she fears that she won't change and stay like she is now, which would devastate her.
1.title: The beginning

info.brief_description: It's a growth / shrink, jealousy centered story about 3 sisters of which one gets it all.
info.description:
The story is about three sisters of varying age who share an apartment with each other because of an incident in which their parents tragically died. One of which will start to grow or the other two will shrink for whatever reason (can be basically anything you want, from puberty to magical alien) while the other sisters will become more and more jealous, which only fuels the growth one sister experiences.

The receiving one can be whichever sister you like, but once one has been selected she has to be the one who keeps getting stronger, better more perfect while the others can only watch and suffer or grow weaker.

The characters are:

Name: Sam (Samantha)
Age: 18
Height: 5,7 ft (1,75 m)
